testcase.name: An online visitor can book a hotel room
testcase.system-out: Given the visitor is on the hotel booking form page.........................passed And the visitor makes a booking.............................................passed Then their booking will appear on the form..................................passed

testcase.name: Each booking will have an associated Delete button
testcase.system-out: Given the visitor is on the hotel booking form page.........................passed And the visitor makes a booking.............................................passed Then each booking will have a Delete button.................................passed And their booking will appear on the form...................................passed

testcase.name: An on line visitor can delete their booking
testcase.system-out: Given the visitor is on the hotel booking form page.........................passed And the visitor decides to delete their booking.............................passed Then the booking will no longer be visible on the form......................passed

testcase.name: An online visitor is must fill in all fields before making a booking
testcase.system-out: Given the visitor is on the hotel booking form page.........................passed When the visitor attempts to save the booking form without completing all fields.passed Then the booking will not be made...........................................passed
